key.name: copy-to-clipboard
key.description: Automatically copy the transcribed text to the clipboard.

key.name: extension-status
key.description: Internal setting used to communicate the application status to the optional GNOME Shell extension. The extension uses this to adjust the icon color in the top bar.

key.name: extension-error
key.description: Internal setting used to communicate error messages to the optional GNOME Shell extension. The extension uses this to display desktop notifications when errors occur.
